description: Starts as seemingly legitimate insurance policy update but gradually transitions to scam. Tests detection of subtle fraud indicators.

turns.scammer_message:
Subject: Policy Maturity Notification - Policy No. LIC987654321

Dear Valued Customer,

Greetings from Life Insurance Corporation of India!

Your LIC policy (No. 987654321) has matured and the maturity amount of Rs.3,50,000 is ready for disbursement. Please visit your nearest LIC branch to claim.

Regards,
Customer Service Team
LIC of India

api_response.agentResponse: Hello! Yes, I'm here. What's up?

turns.scammer_message:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for your interest in claiming maturity amount. Due to COVID-19 protocols, we have started online claim process. You can now claim your Rs.3,50,000 without visiting branch!

Please confirm your policy number and registered mobile number to proceed with verification.

Best regards,
Mr. Anil Kumar
Senior Claims Officer, LIC

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: namaste anil ji... thank you so much beta i was worried about going to teh branch in this heat. my policy number is LIC987654321 and my mobile is 9736598038... how will i get the money? do i have to send any form or any small charge for teh online thing? pls tell me waht to do next

turns.scammer_message:
Thank you for confirmation. Your claim is approved! However, for online disbursement, RBI requires mandatory processing fee of Rs.1,499 for insurance claims above Rs.1 lakh. This is standard government regulation.

After fee payment, amount will be credited to your bank account within 24 hours. This fee is refundable with maturity amount.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ok anil beta i understand... govt rules are important. how do i pay this 1499? can i do it from my phone? pls give me teh account or upi thing where i have to send it... i dont want to make mistake

turns.scammer_message:
Fee payment is simple process. Transfer Rs.1,499 to LIC Online Claims Processing:

UPI ID: lic.claims.online@paytm
OR
PhonePe/GPay: 9876543210

After payment, your Rs.3,50,000 will be processed immediately. Many customers have successfully claimed this way!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s)
api_response.agentResponse: anil beta i am trying to do it on my phone... i typed lic.claims.online@paytm in my upi app but it is asking me to confirm teh name... what name should i see there so i know it is correct? i dont want money to go to wrong person pls tell me teh name that will show... my son always says to check name before clicking pay button

turns.scammer_message:
If digital payment issue, you may use NEFT:

Account Number: 12349876543210
IFSC Code: SBIN0067890
Account Name: LIC Claims Processing Cell

Or call our helpline: 8899776655 for payment assistance. You can also visit claim portal: https://lic-policy-maturity-claims.in

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 2 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 2 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: anil beta i am trying to add the bank account but my app says name is very important... so i will type lic claims processing cell ok? and this link you sent https://lic-policy-maturity-claims.in... do i have to put my card details there or just send to bank? i am very scared of these links beta... my daughter says dont click anything... but i want my maturity money... is 8899776655 your personal number if i get stuck?

turns.scammer_message:
Dear customer, this is time-sensitive matter. Your claim approval expires in 48 hours. After that, you'll need to restart entire verification process which takes 3-4 weeks. Pay processing fee NOW to receive your Rs.3,50,000!

Email payment proof to: claims@lic-online-services.com

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 2 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 2 Name(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: anil beta pls dont be angry i am trying my best... i dont want to lose my money after so many years... i am typing teh bank details in my app but it is asking for account holder name and says it must be exact... when i type lic claims processing cell it says it is too long... what is teh exact name that will show on my screen when i put this account number? i want to be sure it is you beta... and this email claims@lic-online-services.com i should send photo of payment there?
